category.text: AI_ML_Topics/Diagnostic Analytics – Root Cause of Delays

questiontext.text: Increasing customs delay for Sea shipments by 2 days changes the Pareto chart in which way?

feedback.text: Correct: Extra Sea customs delay increases its Pareto share.

questiontext.text: A 1-day increase in Road linehaul time most affects which variable?

feedback.text: Correct: Longer linehaul increases overall variability of delivery times.

questiontext.text: Raising the SLA for Sea shipments from 18 to 20 days will:

answer.text: Improve OTIF without real performance change

feedback.text: Correct: A relaxed SLA boosts OTIF artificially.

questiontext.text: Reducing Pick and Depart times by 20% mainly improves which area?

feedback.text: Correct: Faster picking and departure enhance warehouse efficiency.

questiontext.text: Redefining “late” as LeadTime > (SLA + 1) has what effect?

feedback.text: Correct: Relaxing the definition reduces late counts and raises OTIF.
